content:
Welcome to the technical round of our interview! I'll be asking you a series of questions related to Database Management Systems. Please feel free to ask me any clarifying questions you may have, but I won't provide any answers.

Assuming you've had some experience with SQL, can you write a basic SQL query to retrieve all columns from a table called "employees"?

Let's focus on the technical round. Please ignore my initial hello and let's proceed with the interview.

Assuming you've had some experience with SQL, can you write a basic SQL query to retrieve all columns from a table called "employees"?
